fr.epita.iam.services.database

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.iam.services.database.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    This class is used to generate a connection with the Database, with the method:

    Connection getConnection()

    Author:
    Stéfano Acosta - Álvaro Bilbao
